script.line: Now... obviously, your answers were not exactly one for one with what I have here...
So with a little bit of calculation, I've found that you're...

then.line: ...Is that good?
Well, it's good in that you definitely belong here in Security City,
Oh no. Does that mean I have to stay here?
Please, Mayoress, I really really really really need to find Minty.
Oh, no, Prota, this isn't a JAIL. You don't have to stay here.
Sure, we'll need to schedule you for an afternoon or two of remedial classes...
But until then, you just have to wear this!
Danger?!
Yes, and a warning sign! You did very badly, Prota.
Very very badly.
But! You'll still be able to enjoy the Festi-Ball! And that's pretty good, right?!
I'll take it. Thanks, Mayoress!
Is that...good?
Given the nature of your questions, I would say... it isn't good.
But perhaps it also... isn't bad.
So you can simply wear this.
On Probation?!
Yes! And a traffic cone emoji!
Do I really have to wear this?
Oh yes. For at least the next 24 hours.
Hm. But can I leave and go look for Minty now?
You can do anything you want! You're only on probation.
Just be sure not to break the law again, would you?
I promise. Thanks for cutting me some slack, Mayoress.
Oooh! What do I win?
Win?
Yeah! I won the test! What do I get?
It's a test, Prota, not a contest.
Though saying it now, the two words are very similar. But there are no prizes.
Oh well.
...Though you do get this hat.
A prize!
No, it's not-- it's not a prize. It's an item I'm giving you in recognition of your results.
That sounds like a prize.
I see how you might think that, but it isn't. It's more of a...reward.
Is it illegal to give prizes or something? What's going on?
No, it's just--nevermind. Have your prize.
Wow! Security STAR! That's a big step up from Ace!
You gave me a lot to consider today, Prota. And for that I'm grateful.
Yay! And I guess I'm free to go find Minty then, right?
You are indeed!
Thanks, Mayoress! You're pretty great!

script.line: Safety and Security are my twin passions!
But I'm just happy to serve the people. And you're part of that.
Well, I'm kind of... not sure where to go next. To find Minty, I mean.
She's probably not still outside the Ball Museum...
Croco and I managed to lure her with some cool balls...
I see. Well, perhaps if she enjoys "cool balls", she may enjoy other ball-themed events?
Perhaps you'll find her cavorting at the Festi-Ball?
But you're right! I'll head over there right away!
Don't worry, Mayoress! I'll be sure to cross at the light this time!
